Variable: marital 
Type: integer
Description: Are you currently married, widowed, divorced, separated, or have you never been married?
Values: "married", "divorced", "never married", "widowed", "separated", "nan"

Variable: martype 
Type: integer
Description: CODE TYPE OF MARRIAGE
Values: "nan", "marriage between a man and a woman", "not sure", "marriage between two people of the same gender"

Variable: divorce 
Type: integer
Description: IF CURRENTLY MARRIED OR WIDOWED: Have you ever been divorced or legally separated?
Values: "no", "nan", "yes"

Variable: widowed 
Type: integer
Description: IF CURRENTLY MARRIED, SEPARATED, OR DIVORCED: Have you ever been widowed?
Values: "no", "nan", "yes"

Variable: spwrksta 
Type: integer
Description: Last week was your (wife/husband) working full time, part time, going to school, keeping house, or what?
Values: "working full time", "nan", "retired", "other", "working part time", "keeping house", "unemployed, laid off, looking for work", "with a job, but not at work because of temporary illness, vacation, strike", "in school"

Variable: sphrs2 
Type: integer
Description: IF WITH A JOB, BUT NOT AT WORK: How many hours a week does your spouse usually work, at all jobs?
Values: "nan", "40.0", "35.0", "50.0", "30.0", "48.0", "60.0", "32.0", "45.0", "20.0", "9.0", "38.0", "70.0"

Variable: spevwork 
Type: integer
Description: IF RETIRED, IN SCHOOL, KEEPING HOUSE, OR OTHER: Did your spouse ever work for as long as one year?
Values: "nan", "yes", "no"

Variable: cowrksta 
Type: integer
Description: Last week was your partner working full time, part time, going to school, keeping house, or what?
Values: "nan", "unemployed, laid off, looking for work", "retired", "in school", "working full time", "working part time", "keeping house", "with a job, but not at work because of temporary illness, vacation, strike", "other"

Variable: coevwork 
Type: integer
Description: IF RETIRED, IN SCHOOL, KEEPING HOUSE, OR OTHER: Did your partner ever work for as long as one year?
Values: "nan", "yes", "no"

Variable: cohrs2 
Type: integer
Description: IF WITH A JOB, BUT NOT AT WORK: How many hours a week does your partner usually work, at all jobs?
Values: "nan", "40.0", "35.0", "30.0", "25.0", "89+ hours", "70.0"
